code: import{$host,$authHost}from"./index.js";import{jwtDecode}from"jwt-decode";console.log(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL);export const login=async(id,tgData)=>{try{const{data}=await $host.post('http://localhost:5000/api/user/login',{id:id,telegramInitData:tgData});return jwtDecode(data.token);}catch(e){console.log(e);}};export const check=async()=>{const response=await $host.post('api/user/login');return response;};export const twist=async id=>{try{const response=await $host.post('http://localhost:5000/api/update',{id:id},{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});return response;}catch(e){console.log(e);}};
